    About the Lab

    Showcasing our tools and resources that bridge research innovations with real-world applications

    Open-Source Code

    We advocate for open-source code by publishing our models and datasets on GitHub, empowering researchers and developers to easily reproduce, extend, and contribute to our work through community-driven pull requests and issue discussions.

    GitHub


    Join Us

    We welcome talented individuals to join our team. Here are the various ways you can become part of Complex Data Lab:

    Temporary Research Positions

    If you’re interested in joining us for an internship, independent project, as a visiting researcher, or as a research assistant, please apply using this Google Form.

    Masters and PhDs

    To join our lab as a Masters or PhD student, please submit your application for supervision using this Google Form.

    Note the deadline for each institution.

    Postdocs

    If you’re interested in a postdoctoral position, please fill out this application form.
